intents.answer: DevCraftz is a comprehensive platform for building professional websites, including portfolios, online stores, blogs, business sites, non-profits, and more. It offers customizable templates, SEO tools, e-commerce functionality, responsive design, analytics integration, and third-party integrations for social media, payment gateways, and CRM systems. Built by two tech enthusiasts, DevCraftz is in its early stages with a drag-and-drop editor under development.
DevCraftz was created by two tech enthusiast: Uday and Manikanta. Contact team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com and  dussauday469@gmail.com also Whatsapp number 6304478845 for inquiries.

DevCraftz is built by a passionate team: Uday and Manikanta . They aim to simplify website creation through a powerful, user-friendly platform. Together, they're crafting a seamless drag-and-drop experience for all users.

I'm Irah, an AI chatbot here to assist you with DevCraftz—a powerful platform for building professional websites like portfolios, online stores, blogs, business sites, and more. DevCraftz offers customizable templates, SEO tools, responsive design, e-commerce features, analytics, and integrations with social media, payment gateways, and CRMs. Built by three tech enthusiasts, it's currently in early development with a drag-and-drop editor on the way.

Create your free student portfolio or any shoping website in minutes — just sign up, choose a template, fill in your details, and get your personal portfolio link instantly. Want more? Upgrade to the Prime Portfolio Plan for just ₹799 (India) or $99 (International) to unlock 1 premium theme, up to 5 custom pages, 1 year of hosting (additional fees may apply), basic support, and a fully responsive design — perfect for showcasing a professional online presence.

Price: ₹1199 (India), $199 (International). Features: 3 themes, 10 pages, 2 years of hosting, premium support, SEO optimization tools, analytics integration. Suited for professionals needing advanced customization and extended hosting.

Price: ₹3999+ (India), $499+ (International), based on requirements. Features: Custom theme, product catalog, payment gateway integration, shopping cart, inventory management, order tracking, customer accounts, 1 year of hosting. Perfect for businesses launching online stores.

Price: ₹3999+ (India), $499+ (International), based on requirements. Features: Custom theme, product catalog, payment gateway integration, shopping cart, inventory management, order tracking, customer accounts, 1 year of hosting. Perfect for businesses launching online stores.

Price: ₹1999+ (India), $599+ (International), based on requirements. Types: Blog, Event, Restaurant, Education, Non-profit, Landing Page. Features: Custom templates, responsive design, industry-specific features like ticketing for events, menu builders for restaurants, or donation forms for non-profits.

Instantly generate and deploy your e-commerce website with our Auto E-commerce Builder. Price: ₹4999 (India), $599 (International). Features: AI-assisted store setup, ready-made product catalog structure, integrated cart, login/signup, orders, address management, admin dashboard, payment gateway setup, and automatic deployment with 1 year of hosting. Ideal for entrepreneurs who want to launch an online store quickly without coding.

Price: ₹1999+ (India), $599+ (International), based on requirements. Types: Blog, Event, Restaurant, Education, Non-profit, Landing Page. Features: Custom templates, responsive design, industry-specific features like ticketing for events, menu builders for restaurants, or donation forms for non-profits.

Customizable templates with responsive design.
E-commerce integration: Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay.
SEO tools: meta tags, sitemaps, structured data.
Built-in blogging platform with comment systems.
Contact forms with spam protection.
Dark/light mode support and smooth animations.
Analytics integration (e.g., Google Analytics).
Social media widgets and CRM integration.
AI chatbot support for customer interaction.
Drag-and-drop editor under development.
Security features: SSL certificates, DDoS protection, automatic backups, secure payment gateways, and regular updates.
Optional two-factor authentication (2FA) for portfolio portal accounts.
Performance optimization: image compression, lazy loading, CDN support, minified CSS/JS.
Optimized load times: under 2 seconds on standard hosting.
For AI chatbot implementation, contact: devcraftz.in@gmail.com.

Cool Serenity features a calm, professional design with a modern aesthetic. Palette: Sky Blue (#4A90E2), White (#F7F9FC), Navy (#2E3A59). Ideal for portfolios, business websites, and consulting firms. Key features include clean typography and subtle animations for a smooth user experience.

Description: Vibrant, warm design for engaging websites. Palette: Orange (#F5A623), Coral (#FF6B6B), Cream (#FFF8E7). Use case: Event, restaurant, or creative websites. Features: Bold call-to-action buttons, dynamic layouts.

Description: Sophisticated and subtle design. Palette: Soft Gray (#D3D3D3), Teal (#4682B4), Charcoal (#333333). Use case: Non-profit, education, or professional services websites. Features: Minimalist navigation, elegant fonts.

Description: Organic, grounded aesthetic. Palette: Olive Green (#6B7280), Beige (#F5F5DC), Brown (#8B4513). Use case: Portfolios, blogs, eco-friendly brands. Features: Nature-inspired icons, soft gradients.

Description: Clean, simple design with neutral tones. Palette: White (#FFFFFF), Light Gray (#E0E0E0), Dark Gray (#333333). Use case: Portfolios, corporate websites, startups. Features: High-contrast text, spacious layouts.

Description: Bold, colorful design to capture attention. Palette: Red (#FF5733), Amber (#FFC107), Crimson (#C70039). Use case: Creative portfolios, marketing sites, agencies. Features: Animated transitions, vibrant hover effects.

DevCraftz offers a library of design assets for various website needs.
Currently, there are 10 professionally designed templates for use cases like portfolios, e-commerce, blogs, business sites, and non-profits.
Additionally, there are 6 unique themes, each with distinct color palettes, design aesthetics, and layout styles for customization.
All templates and themes are responsive, SEO-friendly, and compatible with the upcoming drag-and-drop editor.

Available templates: Portfolio, E-commerce, Blog, Business, Landing Page, Non-profit, Event, Restaurant, Education, Personal Branding.
All templates are fully customizable and responsive.
SEO-optimized for better visibility and performance.
Supports both dark and light mode switching.
Clients can preview templates before finalizing.

Clients can edit their website files directly via the dashboard to customize content, layouts, and features. A drag-and-drop editor is under development. For advanced customizations like unique widgets or specific integrations, contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for additional costs.

DevCraftz provides exportable assets and social media templates to help clients maintain a consistent brand presence across platforms like social media or mobile apps. Contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for specific guidance and customization options.
Support Email: devcraftz.in@gmail.com, Phone: +91 6304478845, Contact Page: https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite, Support Hours: Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM IST (India)

Contact support via email, phone, or live chat. Basic plan includes email support with 48-hour response time. Premium plans offer priority email and live chat with 24-hour response. Submit tickets at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Escalation: Unresolved issues are escalated to senior support within 72 hours.

SEO-optimized platform for content creators. Features: Custom templates, comment system with moderation, analytics integration (Google Analytics), social media sharing buttons, category/tag management, and RSS feed support.

Supports online stores with robust features. Features: Product listings, shopping cart, payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay), inventory management, order tracking, customer accounts, discount codes, and abandoned cart recovery.
Professional websites for companies. Features: Contact forms, service pages, team bios, testimonials, case studies, CRM integration (e.g., HubSpot), and live chat widgets.
Promote conferences, weddings, or festivals. Features: Ticketing system, event schedules, RSVP forms, countdown timers, photo galleries, and integration with event platforms like Eventbrite.

Showcase menus, accept reservations, and display reviews. Features: Menu builder, online booking system, photo gallery, integration with review platforms (e.g., Yelp, Google Reviews), and location maps.
Designed for charities and organizations. Features: Donation forms, volunteer sign-up, event calendars, storytelling sections, and integration with fundraising platforms like GoFundMe.
Built for schools, tutors, or e-learning platforms. Features: Course catalogs, student portals, event schedules, video integration, and compatibility with learning management systems like Moodle.

Install DevCraftz’s Progressive Web App (PWA) for quick access to tools. Link: https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Instructions: Visit the link, click 'Add to Home Screen' in your browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox), and follow prompts. Troubleshooting: Clear browser cache or ensure a stable internet connection if installation fails.

Manage your portfolio at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Features: Edit all website features (e.g., content, images, settings) via a client dashboard. Instructions: Log in with your registered email and password. Reset password at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. For major changes, contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com. Troubleshooting: Clear browser cache or contact support if login fails.

The timeline for building and launching a website depends on client requirements. Very basic websites (e.g., Basic Portfolio, Blog) take 1-2 business days. Standard projects require a minimum of 5-6 business days. Contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for specific timelines based on your needs.

Clients can back up their website data (content, images, settings) locally on their own machines. DevCraftz does not currently offer specialized backup support. Contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for assistance with backup processes.

The number of products, blog posts, or pages is flexible based on client requirements. Additional costs may apply for large-scale content needs. Contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com to discuss specific limits and pricing.

DevCraftz focuses primarily on portfolio building and does not currently offer built-in performance monitoring tools like uptime monitoring or visitor statistics. Clients can use third-party tools like Google Analytics or contact the development team at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for custom monitoring solutions.
Basic Portfolio: ₹799 (India), $99 (International). Premium Portfolio: ₹1399 (India), $199 (International). Includes hosting, themes, and support. See Pricing section for details.
E-commerce Website: ₹3999+ (India), $499+ (International), depending on customization (e.g., product catalog size, payment gateways). See Pricing section for details.
Reach support via email (devcraftz.in@gmail.com), phone (+91 6304478845), or live chat at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Hours: Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM IST.
Visit https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite, click 'Add to Home Screen' in your browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox), and follow prompts. Contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com if issues arise.
DevCraftz includes SEO tools like meta tag customization, alt text for images, XML sitemap generation, schema markup, and integration with Google Analytics/Search Console for improved rankings.
E-commerce sites support Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay, and more. Custom integrations available; contact sales at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for details.
Hosting is included for 1-2 years depending on the plan. Renewal costs vary based on plan and storage needs; contact devcraftz.in@gmail.com for a quote.
Connect a custom domain via the portfolio portal at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Instructions are provided in the dashboard. Contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for setup assistance.
Optional maintenance plans include updates, backups, security patches, and performance optimization. Contact sales at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for pricing.
Refunds are evaluated case-by-case within 7 days of purchase. Contact devcraftz.in@gmail.com to discuss eligibility and process.
DevCraftz supports migrating existing websites. Provide details via https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Costs vary based on complexity; contact sales at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for a quote.
Create multilingual websites with language switchers and translated content. Supported via plugins or custom development. Contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for setup guidance.
Integrate Google Analytics, custom dashboards, or other tracking tools via the portfolio portal. Instructions available at devcraftz.in@gmail.com. Contact support for advanced setups.
Automatic backups occur daily for premium plans and weekly for basic plans. Manual backups can be triggered via the portfolio portal. Restore requests: contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com.
DevCraftz supports integrations with Google Maps, Mailchimp, HubSpot, Eventbrite, Yelp, and more. Custom integrations available; contact sales at devcraftz.in@gmail.com.
Websites include accessibility features like alt text, keyboard navigation, and WCAG-compliant templates. Contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com for advanced accessibility customization.

To get started with DevCraftz, visit https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite to sign up. Choose a plan (Basic, Premium, or E-commerce), select a template, and access your dashboard to customize your site. For assistance, contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com.

Interested in trying DevCraftz? Contact sales at devcraftz.in@gmail.com to request a demo or inquire about preview options. Template previews are available at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite before signing up.

Manage your subscription via the portfolio portal at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. Log in to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan. For billing inquiries, contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com.

Facing issues? For login failures, clear your browser cache or reset your password at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite. For payment or template errors, contact support at devcraftz.in@gmail.com with details for quick resolution.

Stay connected with DevCraftz! Follow us on our social media platforms for updates and tips. Contact devcraftz.in@gmail.com for our latest social media handles or visit https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite for community links.
We value your feedback! Submit suggestions or feature requests via email to devcraftz.in@gmail.com or through the contact form at https://tinyurl.com/DevCraftwebsite.
